mapper.sql: id, roleCode, parentCode, roleName, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO k12system_roles ( roleCode, parentCode, roleName, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{roleCode}, #{parentCode}, #{roleName}, #{status}, #{seqSort}, #{description}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE k12system_roles
roleCode = #{roleCode},
parentCode = #{parentCode},
roleName = #{roleName},
status = #{status},
seqSort = #{seqSort},
description = #{description},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE k12system_roles
roleCode = #{map.roleCode},
parentCode = #{map.parentCode},
roleName = #{map.roleName},
status = #{map.status},
seqSort = #{map.seqSort},
description = #{map.description},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k12system_roles ( roleCode, parentCode, roleName, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{map.roleCode}, #{map.parentCode}, #{map.roleName}, #{map.status}, #{map.seqSort}, #{map.description}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM k12system_roles
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND roleCode like CONCAT('%', #{roleCode} , '%')
AND parentCode like CONCAT('%', #{parentCode} , '%')
AND roleName like CONCAT('%', #{roleName} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND seqSort like CONCAT('%', #{seqSort} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{description} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
